# Stanislav Holub Portfolio

> This file is intended for Large Language Models (LLMs) to better understand the context and content of this website.

## Identity
- **Name:** Stanislav Holub
- **Role:** Frontend Developer
- **Bio:** Stanislav Holub is a Frontend Developer passionate about building beautiful web applications. His surname "Holub" translates to "Pigeon" in his native language.

## Website Overview
This website (https://www.pigeondev.eu) serves as a personal portfolio and blog. It showcases Stanislav's professional skills, work experience, and technical writing.

### Key Sections
1.  **Home (/)**: Introduction, social links, and featured projects/jobs.
2.  **About (/about)**: Detailed biography, skills list, and explanation of the "Pigeon" surname.
3.  **Blog (/blog)**: Technical articles on web development, React, Next.js, and related technologies.

## Technology Stack
The website is a modern web application leveraging the following technologies:
-   **Framework:** Next.js (App Router)
-   **Language:** TypeScript
-   **Styling:** Tailwind CSS, Sass
-   **CMS:** Sanity
-   **Hosting/Deployment:** Vercel

## Navigation for Crawlers
-   **Sitemap:** https://www.pigeondev.eu/sitemap.xml
-   **Robots.txt:** https://www.pigeondev.eu/robots.txt

## Social Presence
Links to Stanislav's social profiles (GitHub, LinkedIn, Twitter, etc.) are available on the homepage.
-   **Twitter/X:** [@stanislavholub](https://twitter.com/stanislavholub)
